short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bella ExManager is a browser extension manager with a unique plugin note feature for more efficient organization and management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Unique note feature to remind you why you installed each extension.  
2) Easily manage extensions to free up Chromeâ€™s memory.  
3) Search and track the number of installed extensions.
